Articles.Content: Has anyone found it? There seems to be very few pictures of it...

A guy did. (I think it was Mihara.)

I don't want to spoil it for others, so I'm just linking the page with the pictures.
Oh... It looks a bit disappointing XD I was hoping for minecraft style caves lol

yeah... because of the way planets are made you can't really have caves in them as I understand it. If they want to have caves they would need to put a "building" that looks like a mountain on there and then have caves in that.
I guess so little people have seen it because it's so hard to get to...
Way to go with a spoiler, putting it in the subject line. You should be ashamed, and banned.

Way to go with a spoiler, putting it in the subject line. You should be ashamed, and banned.

Why its not under a spoiler tag on the wiki

I dislike being spoiled as well, but when something has been common knowledge for over a year, I think the cat's pretty much out of the bag. Besides, the forum currently does not have a spoiler system. It's unfortunate, innovine, but it's going to happen from time to time.

I don't see any spoilers here. Okay, the fact that there's a cave system on Tylo is new to me, but now I at least have something to search for if I ever go to Tylo.

Embedding a picture with a location of the cave system, now that would be a spoiler.
The picture(s) does not shows where the cave system is, it just shows how the cave looks.

I dislike being spoiled as well, but when something has been common knowledge for over a year, I think the cat's pretty much out of the bag. Besides, the forum currently does not have a spoiler system. It's unfortunate, innovine, but it's going to happen from time to time.

Sorry Vana but I have to disagree.

Easter Eggs are Game-Content as well as obvious Content. When People are talking about it, it only triggers the urge of the other Players to get there to and take a look by themselves.

If I wouldnt have known about the UFO on Kerbins Pole, I would have never gone there.

But thats probably a "Point of View"-Discussion I dont want to start here
